feature-defs.title: Feature definitions `feature-defs.json`
feature-defs.description: File that describes the measured feature definitions. Is an array of feature definitions.

measured-features.title: Measured values `features.json`
measured-features.description: File that contains the measured analysis values, which will drive the plot. It is an array of measured features

images.title: 3D Viewer settings `images.json`
images.description: File that contains the 3D viewer settings. These are settings consistent with the type of images being displayed.
